name: JSnakeTheGame
description:
Dependencies: jdk 16 (https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase-jdk16-downloads.html)
Simple Snake game, written on java | Version alpha 1.0
Controls:
WASD - Moving
SPACE - Restart
SHIFT - Change gamemode
ESC - Close
IDE: IntelliJ IDEA

github: https://github.com/JIIvot/SnakeTheGame
